questions.text: What is the waiting period for pre-existing diseases?
questions.expected_answer: The waiting period is 48 months for pre-existing conditions.

questions.text: Does this policy cover maternity expenses?
questions.expected_answer: Yes, the policy covers maternity expenses up to ₹50,000.

questions.text: What is the maximum coverage amount for hospitalization?
questions.expected_answer: The maximum coverage amount is ₹5,00,000 per year.

questions.text: What is the deductible amount for collision coverage?
questions.expected_answer: The deductible is ₹5,000 for collision coverage.

questions.text: Does this policy cover roadside assistance?
What is the grace period for premium payments?
questions.expected_answer: There is a 30-day grace period for premium payments.

questions.text: Can I increase my coverage amount after policy issuance?
questions.expected_answer: Yes, you can increase coverage during annual renewal.
